description: Notice of proposed procurement File Number: W8486-249176/Tier: 1 (< $2M).",
full_summary:
**Notice of Proposed Procurement**
**Procurement Reference Number:** W8486-249176/A
**Title:** One (1) Intermediate Business Analyst and One (1) Senior Business Consultant

The Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing a Notice of Proposed Procurement for the services of one (1) Intermediate Business Analyst and one (1) Senior Business Consultant. This solicitation invites pre-qualified suppliers to submit a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of business consulting services under Stream 2, Business Consulting/Change Management.

**Background**
The successful supplier(s) will be required to provide services to support the DND's business operations. The term of the contract will be for an initial period of one (1) year, with the option to extend the term for up to four (4) additional one-year periods.

**Security Requirements**
A Secret level security clearance is required for one or more personnel on the contract team. The supplier must be able to provide proof of their security clearance.

**Procurement Details**
- **Procurement Category:** SRV (Services)
- **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective tendering
- **Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

**Eligible Suppliers**
The following suppliers are eligible to bid on this requirement:
- Suppliers who have been pre-qualified under the Task and Solutions Professional Service (TSPS) Supply Arrangement (SA) number E60ZT-18TSPS.

**Submission Information**
Bid submissions must be received by July 21, 2023, at 2:00 PM Eastern Time. The RFP documents will be e-mailed directly to the pre-qualified suppliers who are invited to bid.

**Contact Information**
For any questions regarding this RFP, please contact:
Kelsey Lawrence
kelsey.lawrence2@forces.gc.ca
(343) 572-4397

**Additional Information**
Please refer to Part 6 – Security and Other Requirements, and Part 7 – Resulting Contract Clauses for more information on security requirements. The location of work will be in the National Capital Region, with a specific location at 45 boulevard Sacré-Cœur, Gatineau, Quebec. Please note that the Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on this procurement.  [^1] 

[^1]: https://buyandsell.gc.ca/ accessed on 2023-08-02

I kept
